Hello and welcome to the Optimal Framework brokers' index.html.

Not much at all here, you should probably either:

  • Install the admin plugin. Basically, it is just cloning it into the plugins folder.
  • Write your own application plugin, make a really nice interface and use the Optimal Framework API:s to give it a powerful back end.

Or both, of course. :-)
